title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 51.1 - Prohibition of examination of livestock by unqualified persons at livestock auction markets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 51.1 - Prohibition of examination of livestock by unqualified persons at livestock auction markets

State Regulations

Rectal examinations of beef and dairy cattle at livestock
markets are prohibited unless conducted by a veterinarian licensed to practice
in the State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
51.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
